DOC.brief_summary: Type 2 diabetes characterize increased insulin resistance impaired insulin secretion . In addition , type 2 diabetes associate low grade inflammation indicate increased level proinflammatory cytokine TNF-α . TNF-α previously show impair peripheral insulin signal vitro vivo . However , unclear whether TNF-α may also affect endogenous glucose production ( EGP ) fast glucose stimulate insulin secretion ( GSIS ) vivo . We hypothesize low dose TNF-α would increase EGP attenuate GSIS . Recombinant human TNF-α placebo infuse healthy , non-obese non-diabetic young men ( n=10 ) 4-hour basal period follow intravenous glucose tolerance test ( IVGTT ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Acute Effects Low-dose TNF-α Glucose Metabolism β-cell Function Humans
DOC.criteria: Healthy men Age 2035 obesity ( BMI > 25 ) diabetes chronic disease
